bio.text: Agatha Harkness, one of the surviving witches from the Salem Witch trials, is an immensely powerful sorceress who has accumulated centuries of arcane knowledge. Accompanied by her cat, Ebony, she has aided many heroes in their battles against various foes. However, as the decades passed, she began pursuing her own ambition orchestrating conflicts among superheroes in hopes of creating a new Darkhold. Her motives for doing so remain shrouded in mystery.
bio.locText: Agatha Harkness, una de las brujas supervivientes de los juicios de Salem, es una hechicera inmensamente poderosa que ha acumulado siglos de conocimiento arcano. Acompañada por su gata, Ebony, ha ayudado a muchos héroes en sus batallas contra varios enemigos. Sin embargo, a medida que pasaron las décadas, comenzó a perseguir su propia ambición orquestando conflictos entre superhéroes con la esperanza de crear un nuevo Darkhold. Sus motivos para hacerlo siguen siendo un misterio.

description.text: As long as this card is faceup in the Storyline, you can't be forced to play your card randomly.
[ATTACK] in each adjacent Location.
Move a Villain, Hero, or Water token anywhere to a Location adjacent to them.
During the next Villain turn, Heroes in your Location can't take any damage.
If you're not in the Villain's starting Location, replace your Location with any other not in play (move everything from your Location to the new one).
[ATTACK] against up to 2 different targets in an adjacent Location.
Relocate or discard a total of up to 3 [CIVILIAN] and/or [THUG] between your and adjacent Locations.
A Villain in your Location has their Movement set to 0 on the next Villain turn.
[ATTACK][ATTACK] against a single target in an adjacent Location.
A Hero in your Location discards all the Crisis tokens they have.
USE on your turn: Reveal the top card of any deck. Then, turn this facedown.
RECHARGE: At the beginning of your turn, discard 1 [CIVILIAN] or [THUG] token from the corresponding Mission, if not yet completed, to turn this faceup.
When this Rune is activated: If Agatha Harkness is in a Location with no Heroes, place 1 [CIVILIAN] from the pool in the Witch Trial Mission.
When this Rune is activated: Each Hero must discard 1 card with Special Effects from their hand, if any, to the bottom of their deck.
When this Rune is activated: Deal 1 damage to each Hero anywhere.
When this Rune is activated: Deal 2 damage to 1 Hero in Agatha Harkness' and in each adjacent Location. Then, move these Heroes 1 Location away from her.
When this Rune is activated: Until the beginning of the next Villain turn, Heroes must play their Hero card randomly.
When this Rune is activated: Until the beginning of the next Villain turn, Heroes can't use the symbols at the bottom of the previous Hero card in the Storyline.
When this Rune is activated: If Agatha Harkness is in a Location with no Heroes, accelerate the next Villain turn by 1.
When this Rune is activated: Each Hero must reveal the top card of their deck. If it has 2 symbols at the bottom or a Special Effect, they must put it at the bottom of their deck.
When this Rune is activated: Until the beginning of the next Villain turn, each [CIVILIAN] requires 1 extra [HEROIC] to be rescued
When this Rune is activated: Until the beginning of the next Villain turn, when a Hero enters Agatha Harkness' Location, she immediately moves clockwise to the next Location.
When this Rune is activated: Until the beginning of the next Villain turn, Heroes treat Special Effects on their Hero cards as blank.
When this Rune is activated: Until the beginning of the next Villain turn, Heroes must ignore 1 [MOVE] action in their turn.
Add 1 [CIVILIAN] and 1 [THUG] to every Location.
Turn all [THUG] in play into [CIVILIAN]
In Agatha Harkness' and the opposite Location: Deal 1 damage to each Hero there and move 1 [CIVILIAN] there to the Witch Trial Mission.

specialRules.text: When Agatha Harkness becomes Under Pressure, flip all Rune Threat cards to their B side. For each damage Agatha Harkness is dealt, check the Witch Trial Mission. If there are 7 or more [CIVILIAN] there, remove 1 [CIVILIAN] from that card instead of removing 1 of her Health tokens. Each time a Hero is KO'd, Agatha Harkness doesn't activate her BAM! Instead, add 1 [CIVILIAN] token from the pool to the Witch Trial Mission.

overflow.text: If 1 or more [CIVILIAN]/[THUG] tokens can't be added to a Location, add 1 [CIVILIAN] token from the pool to the Witch Trial Mission.

bam.text: Move 1 [CIVILIAN] from Agatha Harkness' Location and each Location adjacent to it to the Witch Trial Mission. Activate the Rune Threats with symbols matching those on the Master Plan card.

plot.text: The Heroes lose when the Witch Trial Mission is complete.

specialSetup.text: Place the Witch Trial Mission within reach of the players. Place all Rune Threat cards on their A side. Set aside the Witch Hunt Begins Master Plan card and place it on top of the deck after shuffling it.

bio.text: Deadpool was hired to join Wolverine and Archangel's special task force, the X-Force, a strike team who would employ lethal force to proactively eliminate any potential threats against mutantkind. Due to the clandestine nature of the team's operations, the merc with the mouth needed to set aside his usual persona and act with ruthless efficiency. The stakes were higher, and his unpredictability needed to be channeled into precise, calculated actions to protect the mutants future.
bio.locText: Deadpool fue contratado para unirse a la fuerza especial de Lobezno y Arcangel, la Fuerza-X, un equipo de ataque que emplearía fuerza letal para eliminar de forma proactiva cualquier amenaza potencial contra la raza mutante. Debido a la naturaleza clandestina de las operaciones del equipo, el mercenario bocazas necesitaba dejar de lado su personalidad habitual y actuar con una eficiencia despiadada. Había más en juego y su imprevisibilidad necesitaba canalizarse en acciones precisas y calculadas para proteger el futuro de los mutantes.

description.text: As long as this card is faceup in the Storyline, if you have less tha 3 cards in your hand at the end of a Villain turn, you may draw 1 card.
Until the beginning of your next turn, any special effects on Master Plan cards played have no effect on Deadpool.

Rescue 1 [CIVILIAN] in your Location.

bio.text: Banner suffered from dissociative identity disorder due to the years of abuse he suffered at the hands of his father. This trauma led to the emergence of the persona known as Joe Fixit; a morally ambiguous mob enforcer, born of his obsessions with mobster films. He was manipulative, cunning, and indifferent to others. Yet, to everyone's surprise, he agreed to join the new Fantastic Four after their apparent deaths, taking on a more heroic role.
bio.locText: Banner sufría un trastorno de identidad disociativo debido a los años de abuso que sufrió a manos de su padre. Este trauma condujo al surgimiento del personaje conocido como Joe Fixit; un ejecutor de la mafia moralmente ambiguo, nacido de sus obsesiones con las películas de mafiosos. Era manipulador, astuto e indiferente con los demás. Sin embargo, para sorpresa de todos, aceptó unirse a los nuevos Cuatro Fantásticos después de sus aparentes muertes, asumiendo un papel más heroico.

description.text: As long as this card is faceup in the Storyline, for each damage you take during Villain turn, you may gain 1 [ATTACK] token.
As long as this card is faceup in the Storyline, if you start your turn with only 1 card in hand, you may draw 2 cards during your Draw step.
When the next Master Plan card is revealed, you may put it on the bottom and draw another one instead.
[ATTACK] [ATTACK] in your Location.

bio.text: While fleeing from the battlefield during his deployment in Korea, Cain Marko stumbled upon the Temple of Cyttorak. There, he discovered the Grimson Gem, which granted him a fraction of the immense powers of Cyttorak, a powerful mystical entity. Initially a villain who wrought chaos and destruction wherever he went, Cain eventually began to reform. He reconciled his troubled relationship with his brother, Charles Xavier, and ultimately proved his worth, earning his place among the X-Men.
bio.locText: Mientras huía del campo de batalla durante su despliegue en Corea, Caín Marko se topó con el Templo de Cyttorak. Allí descubrió la Gema Grimson, que le otorgó una fracción de los inmensos poderes de Cyttorak, una poderosa entidad mística. Inicialmente un villano que causaba caos y destrucción dondequiera que iba, Caín finalmente comenzó a reformarse. Arregló su problemática relación con su hermano, Charles Xavier, y finalmente demostró su valía, ganándose su lugar entre los X-Men.

description.text: As long as this card is faceup in the Storyline, each time 1 [CIVILIAN] in your Location is about to be discarded, you may take 1 damage to prevent it.
[MOVE], then [ATTACK].
[MOVE], then [ATTACK].
You cannot take any damage until the beginning of your next turn.
You cannot take any damage until the beginning of your next turn.
As long a this card is faceup in the Storyline, if during your turn you enter a Location with a Henchman you may reveal the top card of the Master Plan deck.

bio.text: As one of the three clones of Nathaniel Essex, Mister Sinister was a calculating master manipulator who spent most of his life trying to break free from Apocalypse's grasp. Apocalypse altered Sinister's mind, stripping him of normal human empathy, which he found hindered his pursuit of knowledge. Amoral and self-serving, Mister Sinister cares only about himself and his work. While he might be an ally for now, it is difficult to determine what he seeks to exploit from this temporary alliance.
bio.locText: Como uno de los tres clones de Nathaniel Essex, Míster Siniestro era un calculador maestro manipulador que pasó la mayor parte de su vida tratando de liberarse de las garras de Apocalipsis. Apocalipsis alteró la mente de Siniestro, despojándolo de la empatía humana normal, que descubrió que obstaculizaba su búsqueda de conocimiento. Amoral y egoísta, Míster Siniestro solo se preocupa por sí mismo y su trabajo. Si bien puede ser un aliado por ahora, es difícil determinar qué busca explotar de esta alianza temporal.

Remove 1 DNA token from a faceup Hero card to use its Special Effect. Then, turn it facedown. If the Heroes win this turn, only you win. The other players lose.

bio.text: Wanda struggled for a long time to come to terms with the loss of her children, but mysteriously, she had forgotten it all. A passing comment brought the the memories flooding back, forcing her to relive the trauma. In her emotionally vulnerable state, she lashed out at her allies, feeling that they had betrayed her. Merging with a cosmic force for the power to revive her children, she now campaigns against her former teammates, her mind warped by grief and cosmic influence.
bio.locText: Wanda luchó durante mucho tiempo para aceptar la pérdida de sus hijos, pero misteriosamente, lo había olvidado todo. Un comentario casual hizo que los recuerdos volvieran a fluir, obligándola a revivir el trauma. En su estado emocionalmente vulnerable, atacó a sus aliados, sintiendo que la habían traicionado. Al fusionarse con una fuerza cósmica para obtener el poder de revivir a sus hijos, ahora hace campaña contra sus antiguos compañeros de equipo, con la mente deformada por el dolor y la influencia cósmica.

specialRules.text: Heroes can also damage Scarlet Witch using [HEROIC]. Each time a Mission is completed, each player may put one of their set aside Hero cards on top of their deck. Each time a Hero is KO'd, Scarlet Witch doesn't activate her BAM! Instead, remove the top card from the Master Plan deck.

overflow.text: If 1 or more [CIVILIAN]/[THUG] tokens can't be added to a Location, add 1 Crisis token to the Threat there. If there is no Threat there, add it to the first clockwise Threat.

bam.text: Add 1 Crisis token to the Darkhold Page Threats in Scarlet Witch's and both adjacent Locations. Each Hero in Scarlet Witch's and both adjacent Locations must discard 1 card from their hand.

plot.text: The Heroes lose when there are no Threats left in play.

specialSetup.text: Set aside the Possessed by Chthon Master Plan card and place it on top of the deck after shuffling it. Set aside 3 cards with Special Effects from the deck of each Hero in play.
